full_summary:
**Fixed Height Work Surfaces**
# Procurement Details

## Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Title**:	Acquisition of Fixed Height Work Surfaces
* **Supply Arrangement (SA) Number**: E60PQ-140003/PQ
* **Product Category**: Wood Veneer – Freestanding Products
* **Contracting Entity**: Canadian Heritage (PCH)
* **Location**: 200 Rue Sacré-Coeur, Gatineau, QC, J8X 4C6

## Tender Summary

Canadian Heritage (PCH) is seeking the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture at the above-mentioned location by March 31, 2024. This requirement is part of the General Stream of Suppliers and is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Procurement Method

* **Method of Procurement**: Competitive Selective Tendering
* **Evaluation Criteria**: Lowest Price

## Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)

This NPP has been issued in order to solicit proposals from general stream suppliers in accordance with the Supply Arrangement E60PQ-140003/PQ.

## Amendment

An amendment has been made to the original tender documents due to the incorrect product category being selected. A new document has been uploaded as an attachment to this notice.

## Contact Information

* **Project Manager**: Martin Lafleur
* **Email**: contrats-contracting@pch.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (000) 000-0000
* **Address**: 15 Eddy Street, 9th floor, Gatineau, QC

## Tender Documents

The tender documents can be accessed through the following links:

* [Link to Amendment 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27456/10232630_request-for-bid-amendment-001.pdf)
* [Link to Tender Documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27456/10232630_request-for-bid.pdf)

The tender closing date is January 5, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST. Please note that this tender has expired. 

I rewrote your text into a more professional format, making sure to meet the 400-word limit.esteem. Note:  The original text looked a bit too casual for a government tender announcement, and I tried to present it in a format more suitable to a professional document
